attributes.action: TO STOP INCREASING THE PRICES OF MARKETS STALLS THROUGHOUT THIS COUNTRY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rental price of market stalls have been and are being increased throughout the country and here in Derbyshire it is affecting the prices which stall holders have to ask and therefore it is causing a decreased amount of locals using our lovely markets. Therefore more and more markets will be closing and this is not acceptable.

rejection.details: Please raise this issue with your local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
